post.description:
Create and add an address object to an applicant or an affiliated person object.

Only one address per type may be added to an object

applicant_id.description: A unique identifier of an applicant, that is assigned by our system after an applicant object was created

type.description:
A category of an address. The possible types are:
• `REGISTERED` for the residential address of a person
• `ADDITIONAL` for any other address associated with a person

full_address.example: 45 High Street, Flat 2A, London, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom
full_address.description: A full address of an object, including a street address, a unit, a city, a postal code, a country

country.description: A country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

province.description: A province (a sub-region of a country) of an object

city.description: A city or a town of an object

district.description: A district (an area of a city) of an object

address.description: An address (a street name, a building number and a unit number) of an object

postal_code.description: A postal code (zip code, postcode) of an object

street_name.description: A street name of an object

building_number.description: A number of a building of an object

unit_number.description: A number of a unit (flat, apartment) of an object

applicant_id.description: A unique identifier of an applicant, that is assigned by our system after an applicant object was created

type.description:
A category of an address. The possible types are:
• `REGISTERED` for the registered address of a company
• `BUSINESS` for the primary business location of a company
• `ADDITIONAL` for any other address associated with a company

full_address.example: 45 High Street, Flat 2A, London, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom
full_address.description: A full address of an object, including a street address, a unit, a city, a postal code, a country

country.description: A country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

province.description: A province (a sub-region of a country) of an object

city.description: A city or a town of an object

district.description: A district (an area of a city) of an object

address.description: An address (a street name, a building number and a unit number) of an object

postal_code.description: A postal code (zip code, postcode) of an object

street_name.description: A street name of an object

building_number.description: A number of a building of an object

unit_number.description: A number of a unit (flat, apartment) of an object

oneOf.title: Address for KYB applicant (an affiliated person)

affiliated_person_id.description: A unique identifier of an affiliated person, that is assigned by our system after an affiliated person entity was created

type.description:
A category of an address. The possible types are:
• `REGISTERED` for the residential address of an affiliated person
• `ADDITIONAL` for any other address associated with an affiliated person

full_address.example: 45 High Street, Flat 2A, London, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom
full_address.description: A full address of an object, including a street address, a unit, a city, a postal code, a country

country.description: A country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

province.description: A province (a sub-region of a country) of an object

city.description: A city or a town of an object

district.description: A district (an area of a city) of an object

address.description: An address (a street name, a building number and a unit number) of an object

postal_code.description: A postal code (zip code, postcode) of an object

street_name.description: A street name of an object

building_number.description: A number of a building of an object

unit_number.description: A number of a unit (flat, apartment) of an object

address_id.description: A unique identifier of an address object, that is assigned by our system after an address entity was created

oneOf.description: The error is sent by our system when an address object with `REGISTERED` type was already created for an applicant. Only one address object with `REGISTERED` type per applicant is available

message.example: Address with type REGISTERED already exists

oneOf.description: The error is sent by our system when an address object with `ADDITIONAL` type was already created for an applicant. Only one address object with `ADDITIONAL` type per applicant is available

message.example: Address with type ADDITIONAL already exists

oneOf.description: The error is sent by our system when an applicant ID was not found in our system
The error is sent by our system when a type of an address is not `REGISTERED`, `BUSINESS`, or `ADDITIONAL`

message.example: Address with type ADDITIONAL already exists

patch.description: Update records of an address object

schema.description: A unique identifier of an address object, that is assigned by our system after an address entity was created

type.description:
A category of an address. The possible types are:
• `REGISTERED` for the residential address of a person or an affiliated person, or the registered address of a company
• `BUSINESS` for the primary business location of a company
• `ADDITIONAL` for any other address associated with a person, an affiliated person, or a company

full_address.example: 45 High Street, Flat 2A, London, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom
full_address.description: A full address of an object, including a street address, a unit, a city, a postal code, a country

country.description: A country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

province.description: A province (a sub-region of a country) of an object

city.description: A city or a town of an object

district.description: A district (an area of a city) of an object

address.description: An address (a street name, a building number and a unit number) of an object

postal_code.description: A postal code (zip code, postcode) of an object

street_name.description: A street name of an object

building_number.description: A number of a building of an object

unit_number.description: A number of a unit (flat, apartment) of an object

address_id.description: In case when an address is under verification, our system will create a copy of address object and provide you with a different `address_id` in a response

post.description: Create and add an affiliated person object for an applicant object

type.description: A type of an affiliated person. `AUTHORISED` type is used for adding an authorised affiliated person. For more info review a corresponding article

applicant_id.description: A unique identifier of an applicant, that is assigned by our system after an applicant object was created

first_name.description: A first name of an entity

last_name.description: A last name of an entity

title.description: A title of an authorised affiliated person in a company

dob.description: A date of birth of an entity according to ISO 8601

residence_country.description: A residence country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

nationality.description: A nationality country of an entity. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

email.description: An email address of an entity

type.description: A type of an affiliated person. `BENEFICIAL` type is used for adding an authorised beneficial person. For more info review a corresponding article

applicant_id.description: A unique identifier of an applicant, that is assigned by our system after an applicant object was created

first_name.description: A first name of an entity

last_name.description: A last name of an entity

share.description: A share in percents of a beneficial affiliated person in a company

dob.description: A date of birth of an entity according to ISO 8601

residence_country.description: A residence country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

nationality.description: A nationality country of an entity. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

email.description: An email address of an entity

affiliated_person_id.description: A unique identifier of an affiliated person, that is assigned by our system after an affiliated person entity was created

message.example: Type of affiliated person is required
The authorised person is already exists for that applicant

post.description: Create a new applicant in the system

type.description: A type of an applicant. `PERSON` type is used for KYC process, and `COMPANY` type is used for KYB process

first_name.description: A first name of an entity

middle_name.description: A middle name of an entity

last_name.description: A last name of an entity

dob.description: A date of birth of an entity according to ISO 8601

gender.description: A gender of an entity. `M` is for a male, `F` is for a female

pep.description: A status of an entity as a politically exposed person (PEP)

residence_country.description: A residence country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

nationality.description: A nationality country of an entity. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

phone.description: A phone number of an entity

email.description: An email address of an entity

telegram_username.description: A username of an entity in Telegram instant messaging service

wallet_address.description: A cryptocurrency wallet address of an entity

external_applicant_id.description: An ID of an entity in your system

province.description: A province (a sub-region of a country) of an object

city.description: A city or a town of an object

district.description: A district (an area of a city) of an object

address.description: An address (a street name, a building number and a unit number) of an object

postal_code.description: A postal code (zip code, postcode) of an object

street_name.description: A street name of an object

building_number.description: A number of a building of an object

unit_number.description: A number of a unit (flat, apartment) of an object

applicant_id.description: A unique identifier of an applicant, that is assigned by our system after an applicant object was created

external_applicant_id.description: An ID of an entity in your system

type.description: A type of an applicant. `PERSON` type is used for KYC process, and `COMPANY` type is used for KYB process

created_at.description: A date and time of creation of an entity, set by our system

profile_status.description: A status of an entity profile verification, set by our system or our manager

profile_comment.profile_comment: A custom comment left by our manager for an entity

first_name.description: A first name of an entity

origin_first_name.description: A first name of an object, set in a native language

middle_name.description: A middle name of an entity

origin_middle_name.description: A middle name of an entity, set in a native language

last_name.description: A last name of an entity

origin_last_name.description: A last name of an entity, set in a native language

residence_country.description: A residence country of an object. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

nationality.description: A nationality country of an entity. A two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-2

dob.description: A date of birth of an entity according to ISO 8601

gender.description: A gender of an entity. `M` is for a male, `F` is for a female

email.description: An email address of an entity

phone.description: A phone number of an entity

phone_status.description: A status of an entity phone verification, set by our system or our manager

wallet_address.description: A cryptocurrency wallet address of an entity

telegram_username.description: A username of an entity in Telegram instant messaging service

pep.description: A status of an entity as a politically exposed person (PEP)

custom_field_1.example: This user is marked as suspicious by Mark L. at noon
custom_field_1.description: A custom parameter to store additional data for an entity by your managers

custom_field_2.example: This user is marked as suspicious by Mark L. at noon
custom_field_2.description: A custom parameter to store additional data for an entity by your managers

custom_field_3.example: This user is marked as suspicious by Mark L. at noon
custom_field_3.description: A custom parameter to store additional data for an entity by your managers

custom_field_4.example: This user is marked as suspicious by Mark L. at noon
custom_field_4.description: A custom parameter to store additional data for an entity by your managers

custom_field_5.example: This user is marked as suspicious by Mark L. at noon
custom_field_5.description: A custom parameter to store additional data for an entity by your managers

decline_reasons.description: A reason for verification decline for an entity, set by our system
